Observation: Existence of Strategic plans that are aligned to NDP-III 5 of the budget execution circular for the financial year 2020/2021 cites poor alignment of Government Budgets with the National Development Plans. The PS/ST urges Accounting Officers to ensure that all activities for Financial Year 2020/2021 are aligned with NDP III and implemented accordingly. Paragraph
Recommendation: I advised the Accounting Officer to expedite aligning this plan to NDP-III and have the plan approved by NPA.
